name: CHESS CROWN
description:
Immersed in the atmospheric world of the game, you have to decide which side you are on for good or evil.
The game against the computer is suitable for players starting their acquaintance with chess. In multiplayer, the player will be able to find a suitable opponent by level or fight with a superior in class. The game has a time setting, a choice of the type of chess pieces and the location where the battle will take place, as well as the ability to communicate with an opponent in a chat.
